author: M5Stack

name: StackChan(MP3) for Cardputer
description:
NOW STACKCHAN CAN PLAY MP3 FILES CONTINUOUSLY AND NEW FACES HAVE BEEN ADDED!

StackChan came to liven up the cardputer's downtime when you're not using it for other things or when it's charging and, now it can groove to mp3s in the background.

This means that when the device is recharging, it won't have a static background and Now you can listen to music while enjoying StackChan's cuteness.

Recent changes on version 1.0.2:

Songs now play continuously, mp3 file titles are displayed when changing songs.

Tip:
When a title balloon is being displayed, press any key to make it disappear.

Controls:

key 1 to change the faces
key 2 to change the background color
key 3 to change the expression 

How to use MP3 Function:

Copy mp3 files to the SD card, then insert it into the cardputer.
Turn on the cardputer and wait a few seconds for it to scan.
Press the (BtnGo)to play music
For the next song press (BtnGo)
volume UP press arrow up(;) 
Volume DOWN press arrow down(.)
N for Next song
B Previous song
P Pause/Play

Note: still in development!!!
author: Teubas

name: CardPoy
description:
I Just Edited and improved Matteo Forlani's Gameboy emulator code for the Cardputer, improving the MENU. It can runs ROMs with a minimum size of 32kb AND a maximum size of 200kb.
Emulator Based on Peanut-GB. 

Controls: Key E = Up, Key S = Down, Key A = Left, Key D = Right, Key L = A Button, Key K = B Button, Key 1 = Start, Key 2 = Select

Ps: Audio Still Not working

Credits: https://github.com/matthew-5pl/gb_cardputer

name: CardSkimmerDetector-M5Cardputer
description: CardSkimmerDetector is an innovative, open-source tool designed to assist law enforcement officers and security experts in detecting and mitigating the threats posed by Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) skimming devices. Built on the versatile M5Cardputer platform, this device is engineered to identify potential skimmers through their unique device names and MAC address prefixes, offering a proactive defense mechanism against digital theft.

name: BrainWaveGenerator-M5Cardputer
description: A project utilizing the M5Cardputer and its built-in keyboard to generate brainwave frequencies. The system allows for the input of two distinct frequencies and a pulse rate to modulate the generated tones, which are then played through a web interface.
author: aat440hz

name: Clone your remote
description:
The app is intended to work with any generic IR receiver module for the Arduino. You don't even need to have it wired with GROVE connector. You can just wire it yourself with the jumper wires according to the module pinout. Attach signal pin to G1 pin of the GROVE port. And you need the SD card to be inserted into the Cardputer so the app could store commands from your remote.
============================
Supported IR protocols
All that IRRemote library supports
============================
Current features
Read signals from your remote. (All of that you read is stored in the array for the later send and limited to 42 entries).
Send signals that were read before.
Copy your remote to the SD card folder
Load copied remote from the SD card
Check Cardputer battery status
Settings (currently empty)

name: Evil-Cardputer
description: Portage of Evil-M5Core2 for Cardputer which is an innovative tool developed for ethical testing and exploration of WiFi networks. It harnesses the power of the M5Core2 device to scan, monitor, and interact with WiFi networks in a controlled environment. This project is designed for educational purposes, aiding in understanding network security and vulnerabilities. I recommend using arduino compilation to change passwords otherwise you will have default passwords ( default pass :7h30th3r0n3). You need to donwload SD files on github to place it on SDCard. use the Go button to navigate with short press and long press to select something.

name: NEMO For Cardputer
description:
Firmware for high-tech pranks
* TV B-Gone - shut off TVs, projectors and other devices
* WiFi Spam - Funny SSIDs, Random SSIDs, and of course Rickroll WiFi
* WiFi Scanning - List nearby SSIDs and get information about them 
* NEMO-Portal - Wifi Captive portal and password grabber (PT_BR version has Portuguese language portal)
* Targeted WiFi Clone + Deauthentication
* Bluetooth device pairing spam for iOS, Windows and Android, with new "Maelstrom" Bluetooth spam storm 
* Funny URL QR Codes

author: Serialgeist

name: CHIMCHIM IR
description:
IMPORTANT!!! You must have a IR transceiver or IR receiver DIODE on PIN 1 of the grove port for this to work. 1.8 stored codes to SD card chimchim.conf
NEW!!!-IF 32GB SD card with folder "chimchim" lowercase is in with wav files in folder, those wav files will be played when IR codes are received otherwise it will just beep
This app will receive IR commands and when you press the function KEY(Orange Fn KEY) and then press an arrow key it will store the code and replay it when that arrow key is again pressed.


Works with NEC code remotes

The module I use is from the M5Stack store.
[Mini Infrared Emitter & Receiver Unit] on website
https://shop.m5stack.com/products/ir-unit

author: gtman

name: MicroHydra for Cardputer
description:
You should erase the flash before uploading this firmware for the first time.
IF YOU RUN INTO ISSUES: hold G0 as you plug it in to enter download mode. You'll then be able to reflash this, or something new.  

MicroHydra is an app switcher designed for MicroPython, with the goal of making it easy to create and switch between apps coded in MicroPython.

.py files can be placed in the "apps" folder on the flash, or on an sdcard.

This is still in development, so there's almost certainly going to be some glitches to be found. Check the GitHub if you have questions :) I have a small wiki going there.

Changes in 0.10: Rebuilt settings app, added HydraMenu module for easily creating similar menus, improved indentation handling in text editor, updated M5Sound, merged experimental PDM mic support, and updated to MicroPython v1.23(preview).

Changes in 0.9: Created File browser, and Text/Code editor. Also added support for multiple filepaths to be stored in RTC memory, and expanded mhoverlay module.

Changes in 0.8: New modules in library: mhconfig, mhoverlay, battlevel, M5Sound.
